casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Daniel Jeremy ECKERT 2018-K-0908 Supreme Court of Louisiana. January 28, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF VERNON Writ denied. HUGHES, J., would grant for reasons assigned by Judge Perret. CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons. GENOVESE,J., would grant for reasons assigned by Judge Perret.

Crichton, J., would grant and assigns reasons.

I would grant the defendant's writ application as it relates to the issue of the admissibility of the testimony of Matthew Larsen, for the reasons set forth in Judge Perret's dissent.
